name: 21/22 Y1C - Team 6 - Fledge
description:
BUAS - IGAD/DP - Year 1, Team 6, Platformer game

Fledge is a 2.5D Platformer that follows the journey of the Little Rocket escaping from the evil laboratory. This proves itself as a difficult and dangerous mission, because the laboratory is split up into multiple buildings that are all equipped with traps and hazards. 

 Said spaces are: 

 1) The Sewers 

2) Hazardous Waste Disposal

3) The Flight Lab F-14

4) Warehouse C - 408

 

Controls: (Controller only)

Movement - Joystick/D-Pad 

Jump (hold) - A(XBOX) / X(Playstation)

Dash (hold) - Right Trigger(XBOX) / R2(Playstation)

Credits:

- Alexandru Preda

- Emanuele Ardolino

- Paul Wetzel

- Tom Baas

And Special Thanks to our Product Owner: Steve Morris

DEVELOPER NOTE
